trigger.Name: TestCar
trigger.script:
AddPlayerVehicle("MirotvorecShot")
local Pl = GetPlayerVehicle()
if Pl then Pl:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("FromR4M1"))) Pl:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.081, -0.019, -0.007, -0.997)) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trExitToR4M1
trigger.script:
local Pl = GetPlayerVehicle()
if Pl then Pl:SetThrottle( 0 ) Pl:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 )
local b = SpawnMessageBox( "8801" )
if b == 1 then PassToMap("r4m1", "FromR4M0", -1 ) else Pl:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(getPos("FromR4M1"))) Pl:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.081, -0.019, -0.007, -0.997)) TActivate("R4M1ExitRefuse_rolik") end end
